name: lazarus
install_details:
1. Copy the lazarus.vim script to the .vim/colors directory. Refer to
    ':help colorscheme', ':help syn-default-override' and ':help runtimepath'
    for more details.
2. Use the ':colorscheme lazarus' command to use the color scheme. You
    can add this command to the .vimrc or .gvimrc file also.
